name: University of ABC
details: I loved the campus atmosphere and the supportive faculty. The courses were challenging and engaging. Overall, a great experience!

name: XYZ State University
details: The college has a beautiful campus, but some of the professors were not very helpful. However, the extracurricular activities were fantastic.

name: ABC College of Engineering
details: The academic programs were rigorous, but the facilities need improvement. The career services were quite helpful.

name: City College of Arts
details: The campus is modern, and the faculty is highly knowledgeable. The research opportunities were outstanding.

name: Science & Technology Institute
details: I had a mixed experience. Some departments were excellent, while others lacked proper resources. The social scene was enjoyable.
